Title: Authorizes the application of topical fluoride varnish to a child's teeth by a parent or legal guardian
Summary: Authorizes the application of topical fluoride varnish to a child's teeth by a parent or legal guardian provided that such application is done under the direction and supervision of a licensed practitioner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the application of topical fluoride varnish to a child's teeth by a parent or legal guardian
